sections.name: Meet Esdras here after showing him the Incomplete Scapular at the bridge

sections.name: Take the elevator down, use a prayer, or get the timing on that jump perfect and FREE HIM

sections.name: fall from above with linen AND FREE HIM

Knock down some trees for Redento
Break the statues, then ring the bell

sections.name: google blasphemous chalice quest, it fuckin sucks tbh
Equip shroud, leaving and coming back changes the numbers on each side. Set it to IV and II
equip big beads of red and blue wax, cut yourself in the middle of the room
Come back once the egg is hatched
Can also be grabbed from prison exit without relics

children.name: Kill that big freak for Redento
Equip all three toe rosaries and let Redento rest

sections.name: Talk to her to start the quest
Finiah all five challenge rooms to send her home

children.name: You'll have to save and quit if you dont have Key of the Secular

sections.name: Kill the ghost, go in, come out
Breakable left wall inside the door
Fill fervor bar, unequip everything, and stand still
Spare her and a check will open in the Hidden Brotherhood Church
If Viridiana is still alive, she'll have a prayer for you
go up through scribe key door down and to the right from here, then break the wall
Come back for the check after you beat him
